title: Tax Filing and Record Keeping
instructions: Complete this exercise to learn proper tax filing and record keeping practices.

sections.title: Tax Filing Best Practices
sections.content: Proper tax filing and record keeping can save you time, money, and stress. Here's what you need to know...

sections.title: Record Keeping Tips
sections.content:
• Keep digital copies organized by tax year and category
• Use consistent file naming conventions
• Back up records in multiple locations
• Keep records for at least 3 years (7 years for business records)

sections.title: Create Your Tax Document Checklist
sections.instructions: List all the tax documents you expect to receive this year and create a filing system for them.

key_takeaways: Proper record keeping prevents audit problems and supports your deductions
Digital organization saves time and reduces paper clutter
Keep records for the recommended time periods
Consistent filing systems make tax time less stressful
